attributes.action: Make Climate Change Denial a criminal offence
attributes.additional_details:
This link is to the worlds leading think tank on environmental issues, many other sources are available on this subject

https://www.c2es.org/  Pew Centre for Climate And Energy Solutions
attributes.background: Climate Change is going to destroy our future if we continue on our current path of ignorance. Denying the Holocaust is, rightly, in many countries illegal, as over 6 million people died. Climate Change will kill hundreds of millions, but this time we still have the opportunity to do something.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take. We aren't sure what you would want to constitute climate change denial or exactly what behaviour you would like criminalised.

You could start a new petition setting out clearly what actions you would like to be against the law.
